member.name: T:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.GeneratedTemplateInfo
member.summary: Represents the result of creating a view to be used with rendering an object model to a string

member.name: P:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.GeneratedTemplateInfo.AbsolutePath
member.summary: The absolute path to the generated template

member.name: P:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.GeneratedTemplateInfo.Model
member.summary: The constructed object model to pass into the template

member.name: P:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.GeneratedTemplateInfo.RelativePath
member.summary: The relative path to the generated template

member.name: T:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.TemplateParameter
member.summary: Contains the information required to generate the model information, parameter name, and set the value to render

member.name: P:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.TemplateParameter.Name
member.summary: The name of the parameter to use when naming the model property

member.name: P:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.TemplateParameter.Type
member.summary: The Type of the parameter, used to define the model property type

member.name: P:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.TemplateParameter.Value
member.summary: The value to bind to the Tuple that is generated with the intent of being passed into the newly generated (unless cached) template

member.name: M:Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.TemplateParameter.#ctor(System.Type,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of this class with the provided values
member.param: The Type of the parameter, used to define the model property type
The name of the parameter to use when naming the model property
The value to bind to the Tuple that is generated with the intent of being passed into the newly generated (unless cached) template
